sentences.en: 'Are you really an artist?' Sara asked curiously.
sentences.cn: “你真是画家吗？”萨拉好奇地问道。

sentences.en: The woman in the shop had looked at them curiously.
sentences.cn: 商店里的那个女人好奇地看着他们。

sentences.en: Liz picked up the blue envelope and turned it over curiously.
sentences.cn: 莉兹捡起那个蓝色的信封，好奇地把它翻过来。
